packageGuid.description: The GUID that will be associated with the C# project

interfacePrefix.description: Prefix interfaces with a community standard or widely accepted prefix.

enum.uwp: Universal Windows Platform (IMPORTANT: this will be decommissioned and replaced by v5.0)

modelPropertyNaming.description: Naming convention for the property: 'camelCase', 'PascalCase', 'snake_case' and 'original', which keeps the original name

hideGenerationTimestamp.description: Hides the generation timestamp when files are generated.

sortParamsByRequiredFlag.description: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters.

useDateTimeOffset.description: Use DateTimeOffset to model date-time properties

useCollection.description: Deserialize array types to Collection<T> instead of List<T>.

returnICollection.description: Return ICollection<T> instead of the concrete type.

optionalMethodArgument.description: C# Optional method argument, e.g. void square(int x=10) (.net 4.0+ only).

generatePropertyChanged.description: Specifies a AssemblyDescription for the .NET Framework global assembly attributes stored in the AssemblyInfo file.

nonPublicApi.description: Generates code with reduced access modifiers; allows embedding elsewhere without exposing non-public API calls to consumers.

allowUnicodeIdentifiers.description: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false

netCoreProjectFile.description: Use the new format (.NET Core) for .NET project files (.csproj).
